title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â        Click the map for a larger, printable image. NPS Map  On this page you'll find a map of the William Howard Taft NHS area and downtown Cincinnati, taken from the park brochure.  For detailed directions from your place of origin to the William Howard Taft NHS, please visit google maps.  Click the photo for a larger version of the map.
